title: Mitosis compared Meiosis prophase 5 answer options

content.question: A human cell in prophase of mitosis can be distinguished from a human cell in prophase I of meiosis by the presence of

choices.label: a spindle in the mitotic cell
twice as many chromosomes in the meiotic cell
half as many chromosomes in the meiotic cell
paired homologous chromosomes in the meiotic cell

content.answer: paired homologous chromosomes in the meiotic cell
